question:
[Chuck] took his daughter [Sara] to the park that afternoon to play. [Judy] took her sister, [Maxine], out to dinner for her birthday. [Chuck] took his sister [Judy] out to lunch after learning that she got accepted into her first choice for university. [Maxine] asked her daughter, [Joyce], if she would like to go to a movie with her on Saturday night. [Maxine] and her daughter [Joyce] went to see a movie yesterday and then got ice cream afterwards. [Reynaldo]'s wife, [Maxine], was thrilled to learn she was pregnant. [Naomi] went shoe shopping with her sister [Sara].
Question: How is [Naomi] related to [Reynaldo]?
